Summary: started out as a bright ball then stirng of lights then pillar with lights flying around it
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Arcadia
There were no other sightings in Arcadia on or around October 27th 2013
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailswe were up on our balcony and looking out at the ball of light thats there almost every night and noticed it changed to what look like 3 lights again. it then turned vertical and red and had like a nucleus appearance to it with numbers of lights. Like a pillar of alot of red lights with a another red light spinning around it like a atom symbol. it was very strange, we had a perfect view of it through the binoculars and got a pretty good shot of it with the video camera
